'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. It is located south-east of [[Dunnage]], and north-west of [[Fort Deadlight]], at the coordinates 25° 52' S 34° 22' E.

==Background==
A lagoon and "home" of [[Hauani O Whe]]. It is one of the four [[Mega Boss Battles|mega bosses]].
title: Murkwater Lagoon
